Martin_Delray:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Use mdy dates|date=September 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Martin Delray | image = | caption = | image_size = | background = solo_singer | birth_name = Michael Ray Martin | alias = Mike Martin | birth_place = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1949|09|29}} | origin = [[Texarkana, Arkansas]], U.S. | instrument = Vocals, rhythm guitar | genre = [[country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 1985{{spaced ndash}}1992 | label = Compleat
[[Atlantic Records|Atlantic]] | website = }} '''Michael Ray Martin''' (born September 29, 1949, in [[Texarkana, Arkansas]]) is an American [[country music]] artist, known professionally as '''Martin Delray'''. He worked as a songwriter in the 1980s, with his writing credits including "Old Fashioned Love" by [[The Kendalls]].{{cite web|url=http://legacy.decaturdaily.com/decaturdaily/livingtoday/060504/delray.shtml|title=A minute with Martin Delray|last=Thomas|first=Ronnie|date=May 4, 2006|work=The Decatur Daily|accessdate=March 26, 2010}} Delray's first single release was "Temptation" in 1985 on the Compleat label, credited to Mike Martin.{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc|year=2008|page=122|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}} He recorded two albums on the [[Atlantic Records]] label: 1991's ''Get Rhythm'' and 1992's ''What Kind of Man''. In addition, he charted five singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Singles & Tracks]] charts. Delray's highest-charting single was a [[cover version]] of [[Johnny Cash]]'s "[[Get Rhythm]]," which Delray took to #27 on the country charts. Cash sang guest vocals on Delray's version and was featured in its music video.{{cite web |url={{AllMusic|class=artist|id=p1585|pure_url=yes}} |title=Martin Delray biography |accessdate=November 24, 2007 |last=Vinopal |first=David |work=[[Allmusic]]}} He also sang the National Anthem at WCW Fall Brawl 1994. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:12em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:20em;"| Album details ! colspan="1"| Peak positions |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="60"| [[Top Country Albums|US Country]] |- ! scope="row"| ''[[Get Rhythm (Martin Delray album)|Get Rhythm]]'' | * Release date: January 16, 1991 * Label: [[Atlantic Records]] | 57 |- ! scope="row"| ''What Kind of Man'' | * Release date: November 10, 1992 * Label: Atlantic Records | — |- | colspan="3" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes releases that did not chart |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:20em;"| Single ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
